Text:
This is a new trend for some uploaders!!!! Encoding a cam rip as a Blue Ray then calling it a HD Rip

Why bother doing that? The sample looks bad.

first off, thanks to boobsman for the up. second, dont whine about free shit. third, would you effin leechers at least have the decency to turn your up speed to at least 10% of your dl speed. once again, thanks boobs.

@ mrnow76 its NOT a cam rip, source is more likely VOD and is much better than the cam / TS copies that have been available until now. The original had hard coded Korean subs so this version has been cropped to remove those :)

Yes boobsman thanks for the release. I know what cropping Hard Subs out is like, and it is, really (for you) for no reason accept for others. So thanks a lot, and don't listen to those who probably just leech anyway. The Releasers are KING HERE!!!

A quite good copy, just watched it on a big screen through a projector.  Some minor hacking at times, but overall just fine.

Cheesy show though

V 8 a 10

Thanks Boobsman for a good job.

NOT just fine.  Video looks clear, but the frame rate it FUCKED.  Around every 4th frame is a duplicate which causes bad stuttering.  This bitch is UNWATCHABLE unless you are fucking blind.
